body:
with commit [`20ad1a1b303df6bd121f68b2a6f3c6a576bba03e`](https://github.com/cp2k/cp2k/pull/300) in cp2k libint was migrated to libinit2.

Changes with this commit: 
- Changed the requested major version of libinit 
- Removed extra linking part (which was due to the Fortran bindings in libint1) 

@dev-zero it, would be great if you could give it a look. Probably the changes here not optimal/correct, but the migration of the libint dependency in the spack package is needed (and the installation worked for me with these changes). Thanks!
title: cp2k: libint -> libint2
